channel.title: Lafuma UK Products
channel.description: Official Lafuma UK Website. Shop online for Lafuma Garden Furniture, Camping Furniture, Chairs, Sunbeds, Recliners, Relaxers, Camping Tables, Loungers and Lafuma RSX and RSXA Chairs.

item.title: Lafuma Futura Clip XL Recliner
item.description:
The new Futura XL is the next generation in Lafuma recliners. As the name would suggest the Futura XL is significantly larger than other Lafuma recliners. It also features the patented and original Lafuma 'Relaxer' system, which can be reclined into an infinite number of positions whilst remaining totally stable. The Futura XL can be reclined in two different ways, either by easing body weight backwards, or by pushing on the arms.
This model also features a innovative batyline seat which clips into the frame of the chair. Not only is the seat easily removed for cleaning, it also provides unparalleled comfort and support. Please note that this chair stabilizes but does not lock into position.
This chair fits in the RSX transport bag for ease of storage or transportation.
Dimensions: 106 x 76 x 22 cm (folded) 125 x 76 x 90 cm (open) Weight: 9.4 kg

item.title: Lafuma RSX Padded Recliner
item.description:
Ease yourself into the Lafuma RSX relaxer and feel your body unwind!
The padded RSX seat fabric is suspended by elastic lacing cords to give hammock-like comfort. The padded fabric further enhances user comfort and keeps the user warm by providing a windproof barrier.
When not in use, the RSX folds down for easy storage. Please note that this chair stabilizes but does not lock into position.
Dimensions: 96 x 68 x 15 cm (folded) 115 x 68 x 88 cm (open) Weight: 7.3 kg

item.title: Lafuma Futura Clip Recliner
item.description:
The Futura Clip features the patented and original Lafuma ‘Relaxer’ system, which can be reclined into an infinite number of positions whilst remaining totally stable. Please note that this chair stabilizes but does not lock into position.
The Futura can be reclined in two different ways, either by easing body weight backwards, or by pushing on the arms. This model also features a innovative batyline seat which clips into the frame of the chair. Not only is the seat easily removed for cleaning, it also provides unparalleled comfort and support. Dimensions: 96 x 71 x 17.5cm (folded) 113 x 71 x 83 cm (open) Weight: 7.8 kg

item.title: Lafuma RSXA XL Recliner
item.description:
Ease yourself into the Lafuma RSXA XL relaxer and feel your body unwind!
Like all Lafuma relaxers, the RSXA XL features the patented and original Lafuma 'Relaxer' system, which allows stability in an infinite number of positions from upright to near horizontal. The batyline seat, which is easily maintained, is suspended by elastic lacing cords to give a hammock-like comfort. This model features traditional foam filled armrests. Please note that this chair stabilizes but does not lock into position.
Dimensions: 106 x 73 x 22 cm (folded) 125 x 73 x 90 cm (open)
Weight: 8.95 kg

item.title: Lafuma Futura Air Comfort
item.description: Made from three layers of technologically advanced fabric; an ultra breathable top layer, a padded, permeable, middle section and a Batyline base layer.  Practically this means you have a wonderfully comfortable, padded seat that does not retain water and is extremely quick drying!This model uses the relaxer system to recline into an infinite number of positions; additionally the seat is attached to the frame by the clip system providing unparalleled support whilst remaining easy to remove for cleaning purposes.  The clip system is guaranteed for 3 years.  A removable, adjustable padded headrest and composite arm rests complete this exceptional relaxer from Lafuma.The New Air Comfort fabric : -* Does not retain water* Promotes air circulation* Is ultra quick to dryDimensions (folded): 96 x 71 x 17.5cm - (open): 113 x 71 x 83cmWeight: 8.42kgUser Weight Limit: 127kg / 20stone

item.title: Lafuma Cham Elips Chair
item.description:
The Cham Elips is a unique high-back folding chair that reclines smoothly into five positions of relaxation.
The Cham Elips aluminium frame is lightweight, easy to handle and not susceptible to age or weather induced wear. The rack-adjustment system is fitted into the smoothly moulded armrest to enhance the modern stylish appearance. The top of the back rest is angled in order that your head may rest against the taut fabric rather than the frame when fully reclined.
Dimensions: 104 x 64 x 10 cm (folded) | 111 x 61 x 68 cm (open) Height from floor to seat 43 cm approx. Seat depth 38 cm approx.
Weight: 2.9 kg

item.title: Lafuma Cham Elips Padded Chair
item.description:
The Cham Elips padded is the same unique high-back folding chair as the Cham Elips but with a padded seat.
The Cham Elips padded seat further enhances the users comfort and keeps the user warm by providing a windproof barrier.
Dimensions: 104 x 64 x 10 cm (folded) | 111 x 61 x 68 cm (open)
Weight: 2.9 kg

item.title: Lafuma Cham Elips XL Chair
item.description:
The Cham Elips XL is a unique high-back folding chair that reclines smoothly into five positions of relaxation. The Cham Elips XL’s aluminum frame is lightweight, easy to handle and not susceptible to age or weather induced wear. The rack-adjustment system is fitted into the smoothly moulded armrest to enhance the modern stylish appearance. The top of the back rest is angled in order that your head may rest against the taut fabric rather than the frame when fully reclined. The new Cham Elips XL gives an extra few inches in width for optimum comfort and also comes with an ergonomic headrest.
Dimensions: 104 x 69 x 10 cm (folded) | 111 x 66 x 68 cm (open) Depth of seat: 38cm approx. Width of seat: 54cm approx. Height from floor to seat: 42cm
Weight: 3.45kg

item.title: Lafuma Cham Elips Air Comfort
item.description: The second model in our range to feature the new Air Comfort seat pad.  With three layers of technologically advanced fabric; an ultra breathable top layer, a padded, permeable, middle section and Batyline base layer.  The Cham Elips Air Comfort seat cushion does not retain water, is extremely quick drying and wonderfully comfortable.Reclining smoothly into 5 positions for unrivalled comfort, this high backed chair sacrifices nothing in style.  Its seat back rack adjustment system is fitted ingeniously into the smoothly moulded armrests.  The top of the seat is also cleverly angled in order that your head can rest against the taut fabric instead of a hard frame.  Simply recline and enjoy!Dimensions (folded): 101 x 61 x 12cm - (open) 111 x 61 x 68cmWeight: 3.5 kgUser Weight Limit: 120kg / 19 stone

item.title: Lafuma Low Elips
item.description: Foldable easy chair with a seat height of 33cm, high back, ergonomic with 5 reclining positions, the seat back is curved for additional comfort. Dimensions: Closed (89 x 60 x 13cm); Open (100 x 60 x 70cm)Weight: 2.8kg

item.title: Lafuma Twin Pack Beach Elips
item.description: This high back chair features a "resting bar" that aids its horizontal reclining position. Lightweight and versatile, the Beach Elips is easy to transport too and from the beach. It can adjust to 5 different positions for maximum comfort.Dimensions (folded) : 82.5 x 61.5 x 15cm (32cm including curved head support)Dimensions (Open) : 88 x 61.5 x 70cmWeight : 2.45kgUser Weight Limit: 120kg / 19 stone

item.title: Lafuma Victoria Chair
item.description: A light weight, mid height back folding chair ideal for camping and picnics. The injection moulded armrests are built to a high specification. The Victoria is easy to store due to the lightweight aluminium frame and the folding design. This fixed position chair has moulded plastic feet to avoid slipping and minimise wear to the frame. Dimensions (folded) 92 x 57 x 7 cm | (open) 100 x 57 x 62 cmWeight 2.3 kgUser Weight Limit: 120kg / 19 stone

item.title: Lafuma Twin Pack Low Elips
item.description: Foldable easy chair with a seat height of 33cm, high back, ergonomic with 5 reclining positions, the seat back is curved for additional comfort. Dimensions: Closed (89 x 60 x 13cm); Open (100 x 60 x 70cm)Weight: 2.8kg

item.title: Lafuma ARJ Legrests
item.description:
The ARJ is an aluminium leg rest attachment. The ARJ may be fitted to the Cham Elips and XL chairs. Dimensions: 79 x 56 x 9 cm (folded) | 79 x 56 x 41 cm (open) 
Weight: 1.1 kg

item.title: Lafuma Beach Elips
item.description: This high back chair features a "resting bar" that aids its horizontal reclining position.  Lightweight and versatile, the Beach Elips is easy to transport too and from the beach.  It can adjust to 5 different positions for maximum comfort.Dimensions (folded) : 82.5 x 61.5 x 15cm (32cm including curved head support)Dimensions (Open) : 88 x 61.5 x 70cmWeight : 2.45kgUser Weight Limit: 120kg / 19 stone

item.title: Lafuma Twin Pack Victoria
item.description: A light weight, mid height back folding chair ideal for camping and picnics. The injection moulded armrests are built to a high specification. The Victoria is easy to store due to the lightweight aluminium frame and the folding design. This fixed position chair has moulded plastic feet to avoid slipping and minimise wear to the frame. Dimensions (folded) 92 x 57 x 7 cm | (open) 100 x 57 x 62 cmWeight 2.3 kgUser Weight Limit: 120kg / 19 stone

item.title: Lafuma Transabed XL
item.description:
A versatile folding recliner/sun lounger that is easily adjusted into 3 positions.  Manufactured with a tubular stainless steel frame.  The Transabed XL has a removable seat, which is both extremely comfortable and easy to clean, and an adjustable and removable cushioned headrest.
Dimensions: 123 x 66.5 x 17 cm (folded) | 88 x 66.5 x 93 cm (open)
Weight: 6.5 kg

item.title: Lafuma Transalounge
item.description: Adjustable and removable padded headrest.   Reinforced and more densely weaved fabric.  Exclusive and safe articulation system. Extra-wide framework. Foot RestDimensions (closed) : 141 x 63 x 16 cm | (open) : 164 x 63 x 68 cmWeight : 8.6 kg

item.title: Lafuma California
item.description:
The telescopic sleeves of the California allow the alloy legs to be adjusted precisely according to the surface. The one-piece white tabletop is edged in a grey plastic trim that matches the sleeves of the legs. A new locking clasp has been added to secure the legs in position. The California folds to just 5 cm width.
Dimensions: 91 x 69 x 5 cm (closed) 91 x 69 x 52 - 74cm (open)
Weight: California: 7.4 kg Height: 79cm approx. when fully extended. When on the shortest "setting" 53cm approx. Leg width: From widest point of legs when extended (width wise) 58cm approx.

item.title: Lafuma Louisiane
item.description: The telescopic sleeves of the Louisiane allow the alloy legs to be adjusted precisely according to the surface. The one-piece white tabletop is edged in a grey plastic trim that matches the sleeves of the legs. A new locking clasp has been added to secure the legs in position. The Louisiane folds to just 5 cm width, and the table is made with a laminated table top on an injection resin frame with a moulded plastic edging and a chipboard core.Dimensions: 72.5 x 60 x 5 cm (closed) 72, 5 x 60 x 52 - 74cm (open)Weight: 5.8 kgHeight: 77.5cm approx. when extended Leg Span - 74cm by 44cm

item.title: Lafuma RSX Bag
item.description: Ideal bag to store/transport your RSX, RSX XL, Hybrid or Futura XL chair. Comes with its own small transportation bag. Available in black. 103cm x 74cm x 16cm approx.

item.title: Lafuma Cup Holder
item.description: Can be attached to the RSX range, Futura range, RT, Evolution, Hybrid, FRS and Chamonix or Cham Elips chairs. Available in anthracite.

item.title: Lafuma Towel
item.description: Ideal for additional comfort and protection of the padded or Batyline canvases for any Lafuma recliner. The towel fits securely to the chair using a pocketed hood so it will not slip down. The towel has three storage pockets on the back behind the head area. The towel will fit any standard size Lafuma recliner. Available in cream. Size: Width 60cm approx. Length 180cm approx.

item.title: Canvas for Futura
item.description: Sometimes heavy wear and tear can cause the canvas on your Futura chair to become worn. For a fraction of the price of a new chair, Lafuma’s replacement canvas set for the chair allows you to replace the canvas easily at home; refurbishing your chair instantly.

item.title: 4 Foot protectors - FUTURA
item.description: Four plastic foot protectors for the Futura chair.

item.title: Plastic Frame Brackets for RSX
item.description: On the odd occasion, normally through consistent heavy use, the bracket which connects the back of the chair and the leg can become worn. Should such a situation occur, you can acquire an easily fitted replacement, repairing your chair instantly. Click on "View Larger Image" above to see how to fit this part

item.title: RSX Stabiliser system full set
item.description: On the odd occasion the stabilizer for the RSX can become weakened by consistent use. Should such a situation occur, you can acquire an easily fitted replacement, repairing your chair instantly (you will need a T-20 screwdriver). The stabiliser set comes complete with the screws needed. Please note that your RSX chair should not lock into position. Click on "View Larger Image" above to see how to fit this part

item.title: RSX Armrest full set
item.description: Replacement armrests for the RSX or RSXA chair. Please see 'drop down' bar for different colour combinations. Click on "View Larger Image" above to see how to fit this part

item.title: Canvas for RSXA
item.description: Sometimes heavy wear and tear can cause the canvas on your RSXA chair to become worn. For a fraction of the price of a new chair, Lafuma’s replacement canvas set for the chair allows you to replace the canvas easily at home; refurbishing your chair instantly.Please note, these canvasses are set out with the following eyelet configuration - 10 top, 19 bottom. Some older models of the RSX and RSXA may have different eyelet configurations. Please check your current canvas before making a purchase, as some older chair frames will not fit these canvasses correctly. Click on "View Larger Image" above to see how to fit this part

item.title: Lafuma RSX Lacing Cords
item.description:
*** These laces are for your RSX or RSXA chair *** If you are unsure if these are the laces you need just check, if your chair has arm rests then these are the laces you need. If you have no arm rests and can lie completely horizontal then you need the laces for the sunbedSometimes heavy wear and tear can cause the cord laces on your chair to wear away and become frayed. On the swing tags of laced chairs Lafuma recommend that 'the elastic laces should be replaced when they show signs of wear (especially in the front of the seat) and at least every two years.'
For a fraction of the price of a new chair, Lafuma’s replacement lacing cords allows you to replace the cords easily at home; refurbishing your chair instantly. One pack of lacing cords will be enough to completely re-lace your chair.
Please note that Lafuma consider the lacing cords to be a consumable part, as they will wear differently dependent on use, therefore these are not covered by the Lafuma guarantee. PLEASE NOTE: The lacing cords come packaged in a box and the laces are cut into four sections and are finished with toggles on the ends. The images on this page are for colour illustration only. One pack re-laces one chair.

item.title: Canvas for Futura XL
item.description: Sometimes heavy wear and tear can cause the canvas on your Futura XL chair to become worn. For a fraction of the price of a new chair, Lafuma’s replacement canvas set for the chair allows you to replace the canvas and headrest easily at home; refurbishing your chair instantly.

item.title: 4 Foot protectors - RSX
item.description: Four plastic foot protectors for the RSX/ RSXA / RSXA XL chair.

item.title: Siesta/LP3 Circular Joint
item.description: On the odd occasion the circular joint for the Siesta / Siesta Luxe / LP3 sunbed can become weakened by consistent use. Should such a situation occur, you can acquire an easily fitted replacement, repairing your chair instantly (you will need a T-20 screwdriver). The circular joint  comes complete with the screws needed.  Sold in packs of 4

item.title: RSX Footrest Bar
item.description: Replacement protective plastic bar for your RSX/ RSXA / RSXA XL footrest.

item.title: Lafuma Sunbed Lacing Cords
Lafuma Futura Headrest
item.description: Replacement headrests for your Lafuma Futura Chair!

item.title: RSX Refurb Kit
item.description: Instantly refurbish your Lafuma RSX, RSXA or RSXA XL by purchasing this kit, which contains the following -Set of Lacing Cords4 small foot protectorsFootbarA pair of frame bracketsA pair of stabilizersEverything to make your chair as good as new!Pictured - Lacing cords green, Frame brackets black, Stabiliser black, Foot protectors white, Footbar black

item.title: Lafuma Twin Pack RSXA XL
item.description:
Ease yourself into the Lafuma RSXA XL relaxer and feel your body unwind!
Like all Lafuma relaxers, the RSXA XL features the patented and original Lafuma 'Relaxer' system, which allows stability in an infinite number of positions from upright to near horizontal. The batyline seat, which is easily maintained, is suspended by elastic lacing cords to give a hammock-like comfort. This model features traditional foam filled armrests. Please note that this chair stabilizes but does not lock into position.
Dimensions: 106 x 73 x 22 cm (folded) 125 x 73 x 90 cm (open) Weight: 8.95 kg

item.title: Lafuma Hybrid Recliner
item.description:
The Hybrid is named after its components - a perfect blend of steel and aluminium. This combination of metals produces the perfect product, which is not only very strong but also lighter in weight than other steel relaxers.
The Hybrid also features the patented and original Lafuma Relaxer system which allows stability in an infinite number of positions from upright to near horizontal. Reclining is easy, smooth and is achieved by easing body weight backwards and pushing against the arms. This chair has a removable batyline seat which is easily cleaned and maintained. The seat is fed through the frame and offers the user unparalleled comfort and support. Please note that this chair stabilizes but does not lock into position.
Dimensions: 92 x 67 x 20 cm (folded) 116 x 67 x 85 cm (open)
Weight: 7.7 kg

item.title: Lafuma Twin Pack RSXA
item.description:
Like all Lafuma relaxers, the RSXA features the patented and original Lafuma Relaxer system, which allows stability in an infinite number of positions from upright to near horizontal. The batyline seat, which is easily maintained, is suspended by elastic lacing cords to give a hammock-like comfort. This model features traditional foam filled armrests. Please note that this chair stabilizes but does not lock into position.
Dimensions: 96 x 68 x 15 cm (folded) 115 x 68 x 88 cm (open)
Weight: 7.15 kg

item.title: Lafuma Evolution Recliner
item.description: The Lafuma Evolution recliner features Lafuma's clipper system. Instead of using laces, the canvas attaches to the frame with a series of elastic clips. The clipper system allows easy removal of the canvas for cleaning, eliminates the periodic need to replace elastic laces, creates a slick look, and improves support across the entire recliner. Like other Lafuma relaxing chairs, the Evolution reclines to an infinite number of positions. Recline the Evolution's seat by either shifting your body weight, or by pushing against the wooden armrests.  It also includes an adjustable and removable padded headrest, and folds compactly for easy transport. Wooden armrests add extra style to the already elegant Evolution. Dimensions: 95 x 67.5 x 15 cm (folded) Weight: 8.1 kg Weight Capacity. 131kg

item.title: Lafuma Twin Pack Evolution Recliner
item.description: The Lafuma Evolution recliner features Lafuma's clipper system. Instead of using laces, the canvas attaches to the frame with a series of elastic clips. The clipper system allows easy removal of the canvas for cleaning, eliminates the periodic need to replace elastic laces, creates a slick look, and improves support across the entire recliner. Like other Lafuma relaxing chairs, the Evolution reclines to an infinite number of positions. Recline the Evolution's seat by either shifting your body weight, or by pushing against the wooden armrests.  It also includes an adjustable and removable padded headrest, and folds compactly for easy transport. Wooden armrests add extra style to the already elegant Evolution. Dimensions: 95 x 67.5 x 15 cm (folded) Weight: 8.1 kg Weight Capacity. 131kg

item.title: Lafuma Twin Pack Hybrid Recliner
item.description:
The Hybrid is named after its components - a perfect blend of steel and aluminium. This combination of metals produces the perfect product, which is not only very strong but also lighter in weight than other steel relaxers.
The Hybrid also features the patented and original Lafuma Relaxer system which allows stability in an infinite number of positions from upright to near horizontal. Reclining is easy, smooth and is achieved by easing body weight backwards and pushing against the arms. This chair has a removable batyline seat which is easily cleaned and maintained. The seat is fed through the frame and offers the user unparalleled comfort and support. Please note that this chair stabilizes but does not lock into position.
Dimensions: 92 x 67 x 20 cm (folded) 116 x 67 x 85 cm (open)
Weight: 7.7 kg

item.title: Lafuma R Clip Recliner
item.description: New for 2013 the R Clip provides many of the features of the Futura relaxer at a more competitive price. Available in fresh new shades, the R Clip will add colour and style to your patio. The patented ‘Relaxer’ frame system means the chair can be reclined into an infinite number of positions for optimum comfort. The Batyline seat fabric is suspended from the frame by means of the patented clip system, giving you a secure yet comfortable feel. Additionally, the seat can be easily removed for cleaning purposes. The clip system and frame are guaranteed for 3 and 2 years respectively. Dimensions (folded) 97 x 68 x 16cm - (open) 114 x 68 x 87cmWeight 6.98kg

item.description:
Ease yourself into the Lafuma RSXA XL relaxer and feel your body unwind!

item.title: Lafuma Twin Pack RSX Lacing Cords
item.description:
*** These laces are for your RSX or RSXA chair *** If you are unsure if these are the laces you need just check, if your chair has arm rests then these are the laces you need. If you have no arm rests and can lie completely horizontal then you need the laces for the sunbed.Sometimes heavy wear and tear can cause the cord laces on your chair to wear away and become frayed. On the swing tags of laced chairs Lafuma recommend that 'the elastic laces should be replaced when they show signs of wear (especially in the front of the seat) and at least every two years.'
For a fraction of the price of a new chair, Lafuma’s replacement cords allows you to replace the cords easily at home; refurbishing your chair instantly. One pack of lacing cords will be enough to completely re-lace your chair.
Please note that Lafuma consider the lacing cords to be a consumable part, as they will wear differently dependent on use, therefore these are not covered by the Lafuma guarantee. PLEASE NOTE: The lacing cords come packaged in a box and the laces are finished with toggles on the ends. The image on this page is for colour illustration only. One pack re-laces one chair.

item.title: Lafuma Arizona Table
item.description: The Lafuma Arizona is a folding table with telescopic aluminium legs which can be independently height adjusted.  These legs lock into position, making this table ideal for use on all terrains.  It also benefits from a resin frame with a moulded border.Dimensions-Closed - 115 x 68.5 x 5cmOpen - 115 x 68.5 x 59 - 73 cmWeight - 9.7kg

item.title: Lafuma Hawai Table
item.description: This oval shaped table features a parasol guide and moulded plastic edging.  The legs of the Hawai are telescopically height adjustable.  The metal hinges are reinforced for strength.  The Hawai folds to 8cm width.Dimensions -Open - 128 x 90 x 52 - 73 cmClosed - 64 x 90 x 8 cmWeight 10.8kg

item.title: Lafuma Fidji Table
item.description: The Fidji is a stylish aluminium folding table.  The table top is laminated and comes with a resin frame and moulded edge.  Incredibly lightweight at 3.8kg, this table is ideal for caravanning.Dimensions - 80cm x 57cm x 4cm - 67cm

item.title: Lafuma Mayotte Table
item.description: This Lafuma folding table comes complete with 20mm telescopic legs which can be independently height adjusted using a rotary lock, ideal if you are putting the table on an uneven surface.  The table top is laminated, has a resin frame and moulded edge.Dimensions - 80 x 57 x 4 cm (closed)  /  80 x 57 x 52 - 73 cm (open)

item.title: Lafuma FR1/FRS Headrests
item.description: Spare headrests for your FRS/ FR1 chair. The different headrest styles are as follows: LFM1566 Outdoor (padded material)- pocket style LFM1566 Navy (padded material)- pocket style Width approx 40cm

The new Futura XL is the next generation in Lafuma recliners. As the name would suggest the Futura XL is significantly larger than other Lafuma recliners. It also features the patented and original Lafuma 'Relaxer' system, which can be reclined into an infinite number of positions whilst remaining totally stable. item.title: Lafuma Futura Clip Recliner
item.description:
The Futura Clip features the patented and original Lafuma ‘Relaxer’ system, which can be reclined into an infinite number of positions whilst remaining totally stable. Please note that this chair stabilizes but does not lock into position.
The Futura can be reclined in two different ways, either by easing body weight backwards, or by pushing on the arms. This model also features a innovative batyline seat which clips into the frame of the chair. Not only is the seat easily removed for cleaning, it also provides unparalleled comfort and support. Dimensions: 96 x 71 x 17.5cm (folded) 113 x 71 x 83 cm (open) Weight: 7.8 kg

item.title: Sunside
item.description: The Sunside is the first sunbed to feature the patented clipped system.  Offering superior levels of support and comfort, the Sunside can be adjusted to four fixed positions and can be reclined to near horizontal. Dimensions:117 x 73 x 13.5cm (folded)203 x 73 x 80cm (open)Weight: 9.1kg

item.title: Lafuma Futura Air Comfort
item.description: Made from three layers of technologically advanced fabric; an ultra breathable top layer, a padded, permeable, middle section and a Batyline base layer.  Practically this means you have a wonderfully comfortable, padded seat that does not retain water and is extremely quick drying!This model uses the relaxer system to recline into an infinite number of positions; additionally the seat is attached to the frame by the clip system providing unparalleled support whilst remaining easy to remove for cleaning purposes.  The clip system is guaranteed for 3 years.  A removable, adjustable padded headrest and composite arm rests complete this exceptional relaxer from Lafuma.The New Air Comfort fabric : -* Does not retain water* Promotes air circulation* Is ultra quick to dryDimensions (folded): 96 x 71 x 17.5cm - (open): 113 x 71 x 83cmWeight: 8.42kgUser Weight Limit: 127kg / 20stone

item.title: Lafuma Mini Ring
item.description: A low level ring chair, with tubular steel frame and removable canvas.Dimensions: Closed (70 x 72 x 11cm); Open (70 x 59 x 69cm)Weight: 4kg

item.title: Lafuma Twin Pack Mini Ring
item.description: A low level ring chair, with tubular steel frame and removable canvas.Dimensions: Closed (70 x 72 x 11cm); Open (70 x 59 x 69cm)Weight: 4kg

item.title: Lafuma Twin Pack Maxi Pop Up
item.description: Thanks to a patented Lafuma innovation, the Maxi Pop-Up unfolds automatically into place with zero struggle required! Unlike other 'butterfly' chairs, the Lafuma design uses elastomer-injected joints to 'spring' open the structure.  This system provides stability and durability to the joints in contact with the ground. Dimensions (Folded) : 116 x 12cmDimensions (Open) : 99 x 78 x 60cm  Steel frame. Weight: 2.73kg

item.title: Lafuma Maxi Pop Up
item.description:
Thanks to a patented Lafuma innovation, the Maxi Pop-Up unfolds automatically into place with zero struggle required!
Unlike other 'butterfly' chairs, the Lafuma design uses elastomer-injected joints to 'spring' open the structure. This system provides stability and durability to the joints in contact with the ground.
Dimensions (Folded) : 116 x 12cmDimensions (Open) : 99 x 78 x 60cmSteel FrameWeight: 2.73Kg

item.title: Lafuma Micro Pop Up
item.description: The Lafuma Micro Pop Up chair features the same unfolding mechanism featured in the Lafuma Maxi Pop Up chair.  Unlike other 'butterfly' chairs, the Lafuma design uses elastomer-injected joints to 'spring' open the structure. This system provides stability and durability to the joints in contact with the ground. The Micro Pop Up is light and easily transported thanks to the carrying strap. Dimensions (Folded) : 73 x 9 cmDimensions (Open) : 59 x 46 x 54 cmWeight : 1.3 kg

item.title: Lafuma Twin Pack Micro Pop Up
item.description: The Lafuma Micro Pop Up chair features the same unfolding mechanism featured in the Lafuma Maxi Pop Up chair. Unlike other 'butterfly' chairs, the Lafuma design uses elastomer-injected joints to 'spring' open the structure. This system provides stability and durability to the joints in contact with the ground. The Micro Pop Up is light and easily transported thanks to the carrying strap. Dimensions (Folded) : 73 x 9 cmDimensions (Open): 59 x 46 x 54cmWeight : 1.3 kg

item.title: Lafuma Futura Air Comfort
item.description: Made from three layers of technologically advanced fabric; an ultra breathable top layer, a padded, permeable, middle section and a Batyline base layer.  Practically this means you have a wonderfully comfortable, padded seat that does not retain water and is extremely quick drying!This model uses the relaxer system to recline into an infinite number of positions; additionally the seat is attached to the frame by the clip system providing unparalleled support whilst remaining easy to remove for cleaning purposes.  The clip system is guaranteed for 3 years.  A removable, adjustable padded headrest and composite arm rests complete this exceptional relaxer from Lafuma.The New Air Comfort fabric : -* Does not retain water* Promotes air circulation* Is ultra quick to dryDimensions (folded): 96 x 71 x 17.5cm - (open): 113 x 71 x 83cmWeight: 8.42kgUser Weight Limit: 127kg / 20stone

item.title: Lafuma Cham Elips Air Comfort
item.description: The second model in our range to feature the new Air Comfort seat pad.  With three layers of technologically advanced fabric; an ultra breathable top layer, a padded, permeable, middle section and Batyline base layer.  The Cham Elips Air Comfort seat cushion does not retain water, is extremely quick drying and wonderfully comfortable.Reclining smoothly into 5 positions for unrivalled comfort, this high backed chair sacrifices nothing in style.  Its seat back rack adjustment system is fitted ingeniously into the smoothly moulded armrests.  The top of the seat is also cleverly angled in order that your head can rest against the taut fabric instead of a hard frame.  Simply recline and enjoy!Dimensions (folded): 101 x 61 x 12cm - (open) 111 x 61 x 68cmWeight: 3.5 kgUser Weight Limit: 120kg / 19 stone

item.title: Lafuma Maxi Pop Up
item.description:
Thanks to a patented Lafuma innovation, the Maxi Pop-Up unfolds automatically into place with zero struggle required!
Unlike other 'butterfly' chairs, the Lafuma design uses elastomer-injected joints to 'spring' open the structure. This system provides stability and durability to the joints in contact with the ground. Dimensions (Folded) : 116 x 12cmDimensions (Open) : 99 x 78 x 60cmSteel FrameWeight: 2.73Kg

item.title: Lafuma Micro Pop Up
item.description: The Lafuma Micro Pop Up chair features the same unfolding mechanism featured in the Lafuma Maxi Pop Up chair. Unlike other 'butterfly' chairs, the Lafuma design uses elastomer-injected joints to 'spring' open the structure. This system provides stability and durability to the joints in contact with the ground. The Micro Pop Up is light and easily transported thanks to the carrying strap. Dimensions (Folded) : 73 x 9 cmDimensions (Open): 59 x 46 x 54cmWeight : 1.3 kg

item.title: Lafuma Futura Clip XL
item.description:
The new Futura XL is the next generation in Lafuma recliners. As the name would suggest the Futura XL is significantly larger than other Lafuma recliners. It also features the patented and original Lafuma 'Relaxer' system, which can be reclined into an infinite number of positions whilst remaining totally stable. The Futura XL can be reclined in two different ways, either by easing body weight backwards, or by pushing on the arms.
This model also features a innovative batyline seat which clips into the frame of the chair. Not only is the seat easily removed for cleaning, it also provides unparalleled comfort and support. Please note that this chair stabilizes but does not lock into position. This chair fits in the RSX transport bag for ease of storage or transportation.
Dimensions: 106 x 76 x 22 cm (folded) 125 x 76 x 90 cm (open)Weight: 9.4 kg

item.title: Sunside
item.description: The Sunside is the first sunbed to feature the patented clipped system.  Offering superior levels of support and comfort, the Sunside can be adjusted to four fixed positions and can be reclined to near horizontal. Dimensions:117 x 73 x 13.5cm (folded)203 x 73 x 80cm (open)Weight: 9.1kg

item.title: Lafuma Siesta L Plus
item.description: Using a secure elastic lacing system, the Siesta sunbed models suspend you in supreme comfort.  The sunbed is supported by three legs for greater stability, the joints conform to the latest safety standards and the backrest may be adjusted into four fixed positions by means of an exclusive Lafuma safety rack-adjustment system. The sunbed can be fully reclined to a near horizontal position. In addition, the Siesta L Plus model comes complete with a headrest for maximum comfort. Dimensions (folded): 84 x 70 x 16.5 cm | (open) 201 x 70 x 36  - 91cm Length: 205cm approx. Weight: 7.8kg

item.description: Using a secure elastic lacing system, the Siesta sunbed models suspend you in supreme comfort.
